original_text:
As with the rumbling of chariots,
    they leap on the tops of the mountains,
like the crackling of a flame of fire
    devouring the stubble,
like a powerful army
    drawn up for battle.
korean_text: 그들이 산 꼭대기에서 뛰는 소리는 병거 소리와도 같고 불꽃이 검불을 사르는 소리와도 같으며 강한 군사가 줄을 벌이고 싸우는 것 같으니

sentences.original_text: As with the rumbling of chariots
they leap on the tops of the mountains
like the crackling of a flame of fire devouring the stubble
like a powerful army drawn up for battle
